title: The Art of Shaolin Kung Fu: The Secrets of Kung Fu for Self-Defense, Health, and Enlightenment
description: This unique and vibrant book, by a celebrated Grandmaster, offers you a comprehensive and practical introduction to kung fu and all the other aspects of Shaolin wisdom. Entertaining and inspiring, it shows how kung fu and other Shaolin arts can bring you health, vitality and spiritual joy.This seminal guide will prove invaluable to everyone with an interest in martial art, chi kung, meditation, stress management, medicine and healing, modern physics and mysticism.
author: Wong Kiew Kit
